amendment.description: Amendment to the Jackson (IL) amendment (A004) sought to limit the exemptions that may be made to the community work requirement contained in the bill to not more than 20 percent of the families assisted by a public housing agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Jackson amendment to limit the exemption from community service contracts to a maximum of 20% of the total families assisted by a public housing authority.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Weldon (FL) to the Jackson (IL) amendment (A004).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 252 (Roll no. 101).
